:root{--pageBackgroundColor:#170e14;--footerBackgroundColor:#170e14;--textColor:#d9d1d6;--contrastColor:#d025f2;--textFooterColor:#f6f6fe;--cardBackground:#fceafa}*{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0;text-decoration:none}li{list-style-type:none;margin:0 .5rem}html{scroll-behavior:smooth}body{background:var(--pageBackgroundColor);font-family:Trispace,sans-serif;text-align:center;color:var(--textColor)}h1{font-size:calc(3rem + 1vw)}h2{font-size:calc(1.3em + .6vw)}p{font-size:calc(.8em + .2vw);line-height:1.5rem;margin:0}a{color:var(--contrastColor)}.nav-container{width:100%;background-color:var(--footerBackgroundColor)}.navbar{display:grid;grid-template-columns:.2fr auto 1fr;align-items:center;height:80px;width:90%;max-width:1720px;margin:0 auto}#navbar-logo{font-size:2rem;min-width:150px;text-align:left;margin-left:3rem;color:var(--contrastColor);justify-self:start;cursor:pointer}.nav-menu{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(7,auto);list-style:none;text-align:center;width:70%;justify-self:end}.nav-links{color:var(--textFooterColor)}.nav-links:hover{background-color:var(--contrastColor);transition:all .2s ease-out}.menu-toggle .bar{width:25px;height:3px;margin:5px auto;transition:all .3s ease-in-out;background:var(--textFooterColor)}footer{background-color:var(--footerBackgroundColor)}footer a,footer li{font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif;color:var(--textFooterColor)}main{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr repeat(12,minmax(auto,60px)) 1fr;grid-gap:40px;padding:3rem}main p{margin-bottom:2rem;font-size:1.2rem}.main-info{grid-column:2/span 12;margin-bottom:10vh}.main-container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;align-items:center;justify-self:center;margin:0;height:auto}.main-content{justify-self:start;margin-left:2rem;width:60vw;text-align:left}#main-img{height:90%;width:90%}.main-categories{grid-column:2/span 12;margin-bottom:15vh}.main-categories h2{margin-bottom:3rem}.categories-cards{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(12,minmax(auto,60px));grid-gap:40px;justify-content:center}.category-card{display:flex;grid-column-end:span 4;width:100%;height:100%;border-radius:10px;border:1px solid var(--cardBackground)}.category-card a{width:100%}.category-card:hover{transform:translateY(-10px);border:1px solid var(--contrastColor);background-color:var(--cardBackground);color:var(--pageBackgroundColor);transition:.5s;box-shadow:0 .8px .2px rgba(239,62,220,.034),0 4.7px 3.3px rgba(239,62,220,.048),0 10.5px 8px rgba(239,62,220,.06),0 15.3px 10.9px rgba(239,62,220,.072),0 34.8px 26.4px rgba(239,62,220,.086)}.category-card_container{display:block;padding:3rem 0;position:relative;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%);max-width:100%}.category-card_content h3{color:var(--contrastColor);font-weight:400;margin-top:2.25rem}.category-img{height:60%;width:60%}.all-books{grid-column:2/span 12}.all-books h2{margin-bottom:3rem}.cards{grid-column:2/span 12;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(12,minmax(auto,60px));grid-gap:40px}.card{display:flex;flex-direction:column;background-color:var(--pageBackgroundColor);cursor:pointer;transition:all .3s ease 0s}.card,.card_link{grid-column-end:span 3}.card_link{display:block;width:100%;height:100%}.card:hover{transform:translateY(-10px);box-shadow:0 .8px .2px rgba(239,62,220,.034),0 4.7px 3.3px rgba(239,62,220,.048),0 10.5px 8px rgba(239,62,220,.06),0 15.3px 10.9px rgba(239,62,220,.072),0 34.8px 26.4px rgba(239,62,220,.086)}.card_image-container{width:100%;padding-top:150%;overflow:hidden;position:relative}.card_image-container img{width:100%;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.card_content{padding:.75rem 1rem;background-color:var(--cardBackground)}.card_title{margin-bottom:.5rem}.card_author,.card_title{text-align:left;color:var(--pageBackgroundColor)}.card_author{font-weight:lighter;font-style:italic}.card-info{display:flex;align-self:end;align-items:center}.card-rating{margin-left:auto;padding:5px 20px;background-color:#7fff00;border-radius:20px}.categories{grid-column:2/span 12;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(12,minmax(auto,60px));grid-gap:40px}.categories-info{grid-column:5/span 12}.categories-list{grid-column:2/span 3}.books-grid{grid-column:5/span 12;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(12,minmax(auto,60px));grid-gap:40px}.block{position:fixed;background:#2184cd;color:#fff;padding:20px}input[type=radio]{display:none}label{width:23%;float:left;text-align:center;background:#fff;box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.24);color:#222;padding:.5%;margin:.5% .5% 30px;cursor:pointer}.to-top{background:var(--contrastColor);position:fixed;bottom:16px;right:32px;width:50px;height:50px;border-radius:50%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:32px;color:var(--textFooterColor);text-decoration:none;opacity:0;pointer-events:none;transition:all .4s}.to-top.active{bottom:32px;pointer-events:auto;opacity:1;-webkit-animation:pulse 2s infinite;animation:pulse 2s infinite}@-webkit-keyframes pulse{0%{transform:scale(.9);box-shadow:0 0 0 0 rgba(255,82,82,.7)}70%{transform:scale(1);box-shadow:0 0 0 10px rgba(255,82,82,0)}to{transform:scale(.9)}}@keyframes pulse{0%{transform:scale(.9);box-shadow:0 0 0 0 rgba(255,82,82,.7)}70%{transform:scale(1);box-shadow:0 0 0 10px rgba(255,82,82,0)}to{transform:scale(.9)}}.detail-intro{grid-column:2/span 12;text-align:left}.detail-intro h1{margin-top:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.detail-intro h3{font-weight:lighter;color:var(--contrastColor)}.detail-book{grid-column:2/span 12;display:flex}.detail-description p{margin-left:2.5rem;text-align:left}.detail-author{grid-column:2/span 12}.breadcrumb{display:flex;text-align:left;padding:0}.breadcrumb li{margin:0}.breadcrumb li:first-child:after{content:">";margin:0 1rem}.tag{min-width:100px;background-color:var(--contrastColor);padding:.5rem 1rem;margin:2rem 0}.embed-video{overflow:hidden;padding-top:56.25%;position:relative}.embed-video iframe{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;border:0;width:100%;height:100%}@media only screen and (max-width:1150px){.card{grid-column-end:span 6}.nav-container{position:relative}.nav-menu{display:grid;grid-template-columns:auto;background:var(--contrastColor);margin:0;width:100%;position:absolute;top:80px;left:100%;opacity:0;z-index:1;transition:all .5s ease}.nav-menu.active{background:var(--footerBackgroundColor);left:0;opacity:1;transition:all .5s ease}.nav-links{text-align:center;line-height:60px;width:100%;display:table}.nav-links:hover{background-color:var(--contrastColor);color:var(--textFooterColor);transition:all .4s ease-out}.navbar{width:100%}#mobile-menu{position:absolute;top:20%;right:5%;transform:translate(15%,20%)}.menu-toggle .bar{display:block;cursor:pointer}.menu-toggle:hover{cursor:pointer}#mobile-menu.is-active .bar:nth-child(2){opacity:0}#mobile-menu.is-active .bar:first-child{transform:translateY(8px) rotate(45deg)}#mobile-menu.is-active .bar:nth-child(3){transform:translateY(-8px) rotate(-45deg)}.category-card{grid-column-end:span 6}}@media only screen and (max-width:700px){main{grid-gap:10px}.main-content{grid-column:1/span 2}.main-img-container{display:none}.categories-cards{grid-gap:20px}.category-card{grid-column-end:span 12;padding:2rem 0}.cards{grid-column:2/span 6;grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);grid-gap:20px}.card_link{grid-column-end:span 3}@media only screen and (max-width:500px){.card_link{grid-column-end:span 6}}}
